thread.title: Internet Trolls Get the Last Laugh After Finding “Secret” Protest Location and Loading It Up With Trump Gear
thread.title_full: Internet Trolls Get the Last Laugh After Finding “Secret” Protest Location and Loading It Up With Trump Gear

author: John Falkenberg
title: Internet Trolls Get the Last Laugh After Finding “Secret” Protest Location and Loading It Up With Trump Gear
text:
The flag was found Thursday off a highway in the Volunteer State and taken down. It was replaced with a Trump “Make America Great Again” hat and a Pepe the Frog T-Shirt, according to TheBlaze . 
Check out the replacement here. The “MAGA” hat appears about the 2:30 mark: 
The Livestream was then cut off. Now the stream just says “waiting for the event to go live” as of Tuesday afternoon. 
OK, what happened here might technically be called stealing, and that’s not cool. But the way they did it? 
That was pretty cool.. 
Please share this on Facebook and Twitter and let us know what you think about this story! What do you think of this incident? Scroll down to comment below! Advertisement Popular Right Now
